amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for the remainder of FY 2011 for the Air Force and Navy's aircraft procurement accounts by cutting funding for the V-22 by $415,083,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the amount for Aircraft Procurement, Navy by $21,985,000, the Aircraft Procurement, Air Force by $393,098,000 and increase Defense by $415,083,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 326 (Roll no. 43).
